DOC.brief_title: Markers Alzheimers Disease Cognitive Outcomes After Perioperative Care
DOC.criteria: Surgical patient 60 year age old Surgery schedule last least 2 hour ( include time anesthesia induction , etc ) English speak ability . Ability give inform consent Inmate correctional facility ( i.e . prisoner ) . Pregnancy Documented suspect family personal history malignant hyperthermia . Patient unable receive either propofol isoflurane due allergy specific contraindication .
